name: Rabbitcenaries
description:
A challenging and touching mobile game, you have been the prey all your life, but this is over, you will not allow the wolves to continue tormenting your people even if it means war, embody your elite soldier and prepare for the battle against the ferocious creatures What do they do in the forest, hire mercenaries to accompany you on your crusade and enter the wolf's lair.

HOW TO PLAY?

Download and explore the first prototype. Enjoy!
